description: Send messages, receive commands, and work with device twins in Azure IoT Hub.

contents.name: connection_status
contents.description: Returns `"ok"` when connected, empty `""` when disconnected, and an error description otherwise.

contents.name: hub_name
contents.description: Something like `my-iot-hub.azure-devices.net`; empty string when not properly configured

contents.name: device_id
contents.description: Something like `my-dev-007`; empty string when `connection_string` is not set.

contents.name: message
contents.description:
This event is emitted upon reception of a cloud to device message, that is a string
(doesn't contain NUL bytes) and fits in a single event packet.

contents.name: connected
contents.description: Raised when the device is connected to the hub.

contents.name: disconnected
contents.description: Raised when the device is disconnected to the hub. ``connection_status`` may contain information about the error.
